page.title: 11A view on Sports in Kirkby
page.content: My name is Sarah and on the 13th June 1985 I took part in a survey with 10 other members of my class to find out if people had any thoughts on how the sports facilities in Kirkby could be improved. Many people seemed to think that the charge for using the amenities offered in Kirkby Stadium should be reduced. In many cases, however, they did not realise the range of activities that were offered there. For example, there are opportunities for gymnastics, aerobics, weight lifting, cycling, shooting and Karate. When they were told this many people changed their minds. A lot of people also thought that the cost of playing golf and for swimming at the local baths was too expensive. I think that the reason why so many people are worried about the expense is because they are unemployed
